about_the_game:
PANDOREX... Nobody really knows what is up with it.

About the story:
And then there is Harry. Harry is a simple, not very social guy. His best friend is his dog. Unfortunately he lost his dog. And since his dog is the only thing that is important to Harry, he starts looking for it, willing to do everything as long as he gets his dog back. And that´s where the story begins. Harry is only a very small piece of the puzzle, but in the end he could be the most important one. The one piece that holds the universe together or is responsible for the demise of the universe and therefore the demise of all life not only on earth, but on all the planets.

About the game:
You are responsible to aid Harry in his adventures, help him to choose the right decision and solve puzzles and riddles that come across Harrys long journey of finding his dog and hopefully not destroying the universe. Pandorex is a humorous and funny narrative-driven point and click adventure with a small tick of social criticism and a lot of pop culture and subgenre references. This game does not take itself very seriously, so you should not do it either!

Features:
- Narrative-driven point and click adventure
- Riddles and puzzles need to be solved to make progress
- Decision making: you have to decide what the character will do or say. Based on your decisions the story path may change.

PANDOREX... Nobody really knows what is up with it.

About the story:
And then there is Harry. Harry is a simple, not very social guy. His best friend is his dog. Unfortunately he lost his dog. And since his dog is the only thing that is important to Harry, he starts looking for it, willing to do everything as long as he gets his dog back. And that´s where the story begins. Harry is only a very small piece of the puzzle, but in the end he could be the most important one. The one piece that holds the universe together or is responsible for the demise of the universe and therefore the demise of all life not only on earth, but on all the planets.

You are responsible to aid Harry in his adventures, help him to choose the right decision and solve puzzles and riddles that come across Harrys long journey of finding his dog and hopefully not destroying the universe. Pandorex is a humorous and funny narrative-driven point and click adventure with a small tick of social criticism and a lot of pop culture and subgenre references. This game does not take itself very seriously, so you should not do it either!

name: Pandorex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: > Windows 8
  • Processor: Any Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 650 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: enjoy the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 1200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: enjoy the game

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Violência
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: PANDOREX invites you on a mind-bending adventure with an unlikely duo—a sarcastic dodo and his human buddy Harry—on a mission to save the universe. This narrative-driven point-and-click adventure is packed with intriguing puzzles, challenging riddles, and impactful choices that shape your journey.
